usersettings: This is the url of your LDAP server (e.g. ldap.ncsu.edu).
This is the base bind. (e.g. dc=ncsu, dc=edu).
This is the bind distinguished name. (e.g. ou=accounts).
Select true for non-self-signed certificate on the LDAP server.
The string used to retrieve user groups from the server (e.g. memberNisNetgroup).
